name: P2T
description: Push to talk units (P2T) used by Customer Greeters to alert the team, notify a manager, and report suspicious behaviour discreetly.
constraints: Every Customer Greeter must have Push to talk units (P2T).
caveats: Report suspicious behaviour discreetly using P2T whilst adhering to the Managing Threatening Situations - 4Ds Poster.
bestPractice: Alert the team via P2T when assisting customers with enquiries such as product locations and directing customers for refunds or exchanges to the Service Desk.
Monitor trolley and basket availability and use P2T to notify a manager if replenishment is required.
